page.title: 03A Typical School Afternoon.
page.content: After dinner at Great Houghton J. & I.School,usually about 12-20,we go out to play.At 1 o'clock we begin the{afternoon session}by getting out our{reading books.}After reading for 15 minutes we may do some{art work. The afternoon break is from 2.15 to 2.25 When we come in from afternoon break we get out our{English}books and work out a deletion exercise,which is filling in the missing words. At 3.30 the hometime bell rings.It takes me 15 mins to get home.When I arrive home I switch on{Childrens ITV.}At 5.15 my mum and dad come home and I have my tea with them.Then I go upstairs to change for the{Gymnastics Club.}When I come home from gym I practise my badge exercises for 10 mins then I go out to play until 8.30. Finally I watch TV.I go to bed between 9.00 and 10.00.
